attributes.action: Make it a legally mandatory part of any sentence handed down to an immigrant that deportation on completion is automatic.
attributes.additional_details: Judges are still NOT ordering the deportation of immigrant criminals on sentencing.  Ordering of deportation of such criminals needs to be a legally binding requirement on ALL judges passing sentences on immigrant criminals.  Judges who fail to comply with that law can then be held criminallly liable for their failure to do so and be sacked, to be replaced with people who have more respect for the people and concern for the country than they do for their own privileged position.
